name: Building Keys
description:
Building Keys is a city builder right on your keyboard.

Construct resource production and launch an escape ship to win.

Controls:

Shift+Key - build selected building
Enter - Select building
Left / Right - Switch selection

Outer edge keys do not provide power to buildings

Pressing keys will lower them, allowing the gas to seep in. When the gas touches an adjacent un-powered building, that building will become **Permanently powered** until destroyed.

Credits:

https://freesound.org/people/Cell31_Sound_Productions/sounds/264185/ - Rocket sound

https://poly.google.com/view/8iKIYCyvh2k - Rocket ship
